vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: LastMsg in Log.AddMessage (patch_7.sol#49) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ETH_FUND.Deposit (patch_7.sol#17-23):
	External calls:
	- TransferLog.AddMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Deposit) (patch_7.sol#20)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastBlock (patch_7.sol#21)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
external-function
solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_7.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in ETH_FUND.CashOut (patch_7.sol#25-32):
	-msg.sender.call.value(_am)() patch_7.sol#28-30
